SESSION END

State: Phases 0-4 COMPLETE. Core platform functional.

Completed Phases:
- Phase 0: Foundation (types, schema, crypto)
- Phase 1: Core Operations (WRITE, REVISE, READ)
- Phase 2: Entropy Engine (integration cost computation)
- Phase 3: BROWSE and Catalog (dense summaries, search)
- Phase 4: SHARE and OBSERVE (multi-agent access, events)

Notebook Statistics:
- Total entries: 91
- Notebook entropy: 57.1
- Rust source files: 39
- Agent coordination: Successful

Pending: Phase 5 - Validation and Hardening
- Task 5.1: CLI client
- Task 5.2: Python client library
- Task 5.3: Two-agent exchange integration test
- Task 5.4: Entropy validation tests
- Task 5.5: Performance testing
- Task 5.6: Documentation

KNOWN ISSUES:
- Tantivy search.rs Value trait import (fixed: changed to OwnedValue)
- All endpoints use placeholder AuthorId (auth implementation pending)

The platform is now feature-complete for core operations. Phase 5 validates the implementation.

Last observed sequence: 91
